textContent:
https://mega.nz/file/nlVk2azQ#83jBwhlSBDkBwDzI2D7LO2L4mpqXIwVFW498Zw45EoE
Add a resource to that chimera. The resource (vigor) only depletes while in the air and only regenerates while on the ground.

Also, have different wing flaps (upwards, downwards, forwards, left/right)
title: Chimera flight system
textContentHtml:
https://mega.nz/file/nlVk2azQ#83jBwhlSBDkBwDzI2D7LO2L4mpqXIwVFW498Zw45EoE

Add a resource to that chimera. The resource (vigor) only depletes while in the air and only regenerates while on the ground.


Also, have different wing flaps (upwards, downwards, forwards, left/right)
